channel.title: basta-ya-de-picar on The long way through Software Craftsmanship
channel.description: Recent content in basta-ya-de-picar on The long way through Software Craftsmanship

item.title: Podcast: Basta ya de picar (Spanish)
item.description: Some weeks ago I listened to some podcasts from BastaYaDePicar (episodes 1 to 8) and now I’m listening more (9 to 10). I really recommend these to you, and I imagine that the newer episodes (also new format) will be interesting too. They’re in Spanish and narrated by Sebastian Hermida
